TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CultureInfoConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter) 將 物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換與字串的物件。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立執行個體類別。You should never create an instance of the class. 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的型別變數為字串，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. 它會先建構使用希臘文文化特性 （由"el"） 的變數並將它轉換為字串"希臘文"。First it constructs a variable using the Greek culture (represented by "el") and converts it to the string "Greek". 然後它會將字串"俄文"表示 「 ru"。Then it converts the string "Russian" to the representation "ru". [!code-cpp[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#8)]

A that represents the type you wish to convert from.

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個轉換子是否可以使用指定的內容，將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成 。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換與字串的物件。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.para: 覆寫這個方法，以提供您自己的轉換需求。
Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

span.span: An that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容，取得 物件的標準值集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of standard values for a object using the specified context.

returns.span: 含有標準有效值的集合，如果資料型別不支援標準值集合，則為 。

span.span: A containing a standard set of valid values, or if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

returns.span: 因為從 傳回的 不是可能值 (也就是說，其他值也有可能) 的詳盡清單，所以會是 。

span.span: because the returned from is not an exhaustive list of possible values (that is, other values are possible).

returns.span: 這個方法永遠不會傳回 。

span.span: This method never returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. 當清單未全部列出時，還有其他有效值 besides 標準的清單值提供。When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

returns.span: 因為應該呼叫 來尋找物件支援的通用值集合，所以會是 。

span.span: because should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.

returns.span: 這個方法永遠不會傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
